thread.title: BREAKING: Bomb discovered in London street triggers mass evacuation
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Bomb discovered in London street triggers mass evacuation

title: BREAKING: Bomb discovered in London street triggers mass evacuation
text:
SHOREDITCH BOMB SCARE: Cops have evacuated the area 
Police discovered the World War 2 device in Shoreditch High Street in East London. 
The area has now been closed off and nearby buildings evacuated. 
TWITTER BOMB: Shoreditch High Street has been closed off Police prepare for terror attacks Thursday, 4th August 2016 European Police are staging numerous training exercises to be best prepared for future terrorist attacks. 1 / 41 AFP/Getty Images Armed Metropolitan Police counter terrorism officers take part in an exercise on the River Thames in London 
MORE TO FOLLOW
